returnPolicy.title: Product Return Policy
returnPolicy.intro: Customer satisfaction and trust are our priorities.

items.title: Product Storage Conditions
items.description: Products to be returned must be unopened. Vial bottles should be stored in a cool and shaded environment away from direct sunlight. Capsules, liquid products, and powder products should be stored at room temperature.

items.title: Original Condition and Packaging
items.description: For the return of products, they must be in the condition they were purchased and in their original packaging. Returns of opened or partially used products are not accepted.

items.title: Return Process
items.description: After your returned products are inspected, you will be informed about the refund status. The refund amount will be transferred to your bank account. However, packaging, labor, and shipping fees will be deducted from the refund amount.

items.title: Shipping Costs
items.description: You are responsible for covering your own shipping costs to return your products.

returnPolicy.footerNote: You can perform your return transactions in accordance with the above conditions. For more information or support, please contact us.
